frontmatter.title: Pasta with Scampi in Fennel-Garlic Cream Sauce
frontmatter.description: A delightful pasta dish featuring succulent scampi in a rich fennel-garlic cream sauce.
frontmatter.author: Benjamin Degryse

image.alt: Pasta with Scampi in Fennel-Garlic Cream Sauce

frontmatter.title: Breaded Dandan Meatballs with Udon Noodles, Chinese Cabbage, and Sweet Paprika
frontmatter.description: A savory and satisfying dish featuring breaded Dandan meatballs served with udon noodles, Chinese cabbage, and sweet paprika.
frontmatter.author: Benjamin Degryse

image.alt: Breaded Dandan Meatballs with Udon Noodles, Chinese Cabbage, and Sweet Paprika
